attributes.action: To make a public statement that our war in Afghanistan is also against the things that are considered "haram" by the Muslims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To highlight to all that the war in agfhanistan and Iraq is not a "war on terror" but a war against drug lords, arms traffickers and thugs in organised crime who may use religion for recruits. Focus on the flow of drugs from Afghanistan and the flow of money to buy the ammunition by the mercenaries and in taht manner you have the support of 1 billion Muslims.
